text: Sir Thomas Robinson, 1st Baronet (1703â€“1777) was an English architect and collector. Thomas left his brother William his title but not his estates. He left his brother Richard his books, including those on architecture and antiquities. On 2 March 1730, he became a Baronet of Rokeby. Rokeby is in the County of York. title: Thomas Robinson, 1st Baronet Rokeby
